title: Lovely 2 bedroom, 1 bath Ranch located
posting_body: Lovely 2 bedroom, 1 bath Ranch located on a very private lot 2.3-acre lot surrounded by beautiful, mature trees and sweeping lawns.

Features: 2 beds that share a hall bath; living room with brick fireplace; eat in kitchen with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and propane gas range; dining room is off kitchen; full basement offers lots of storage space and has laundry area; hardwood flooring throughout most of the home; newer roof; custom drapes; driveway parking and nice back porch; roof and the septic tank are both only within 5-7 years old..
Very secluded yet close to shopping, highways, schools and more!!
A classic starter home with great bones and loads of potential!!!
